subject: Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: One night after his superb performance in the nightcap of the Yankees’ doubleheader sweep of the Blue Jays on Tuesday, the utility man Jayson Nix was hit by a pitch that broke his hand.
snippet: One night after his superb performance in the nightcap of the Yankees’ doubleheader sweep of the Blue Jays on Tuesday, the utility man Jayson Nix was hit by a pitch that broke his hand.
